Class DataStorage

java.lang.Object
edu.cairn.cis332finalproject.DataStorage
public class DataStorage extends Object
Provides data persistence services for user information. Uses Jackson for JSON serialization and deserialization.

  • Method Details

    • saveData

      public static void saveData(Map<String,UserData> data) throws IOException
      Saves the user data map to a JSON file.
      Parameters:
      data - map of usernames to UserData objects to save
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file writing

    • loadData

      public static Map<String,UserData> loadData()
      Loads user data from the JSON file.
      Returns:
      a map of usernames to UserData objects

    • saveUser

      public static void saveUser(UserData user)
      Saves or updates a user in the data store. If the user already exists, it will be replaced.
      Parameters:
      user - the UserData object to save

    • loadUser

      public static UserData loadUser(String username)
      Loads a specific user by username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to look up
      Returns:
      the UserData object or null if not found

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes a user from the data store.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to delete

    • getUserCount

      public static int getUserCount()
      Gets the total number of users in the data store.
      Returns:
      the count of users

    • saveHangmanData

      public static void saveHangmanData(String username, int[] info)

    • loadHangmanData

      public static int[] loadHangmanData(String username)
